name: Nuclear Meltdown
description:
Game made for the Unreal engine jam summer edition 2018. The theme was: Well, that escalated quickly.

The game is about a man who use to sleep at work. One day while asleep the think goes crazy, he wake up in the middle of a nuclear meltdown.

Use WASD to move and the left mouse button to hit the blobs and push some buttons.

Feel the stress of a catastrophic Nuclear Meltdown

Enjoy
